statics.name: fromJSON
statics.description: Loads a grammar from a JSON object or string

parameters.desc: a String or JSON object representation of the grammar
the context for any referenced variables or functions (optional)

functions.name: addRule
functions.description: Adds a rule to the existing grammar, replacing any existing rule with the same name

functions.name: expand
functions.description: Expands a grammar from the supplied rule. If no rule is provided the \$start and #60;start>' symbols will be checked respectively.

parameters.desc: the rule name to be expanded (optional)
the context for any referenced variables or functions (optional)

returns.desc: the result of the expansion (or an error if the rule is not found)

functions.name: removeRule
functions.description: Deletes the named rule from the grammar

functions.name: addRules
functions.description: Loads a grammar from an object (or Map in Java).

parameters.desc: an object representation of the grammar

functions.name: toString
functions.example:
rm = new Grammar(rules);
s = rm.toString();//return default formatted string
s = rm.toString('/'); //return a string with '/' marking the end of each rule
functions.description: Returns a formatted version of this grammar

parameters.desc: a String or a char to mark the end of each rule

functions.name: toJSON
functions.description: Return a formatted version of this grammar.

returns.desc: the grammar as a json string
